entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character in the story who is speaking and reacting to Ron's statement. She says 'Excuse me?' and then asks what Ron was saying.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a character in the story who is speaking and making a joke about Bubbitty Rabbitty. He looks at Harry and Hermione in disbelief.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story who is mentioned by Ron as someone who was brought up by Muggles.

entities.name: bubbitty rabbitty
entities.description: Bubbitty Rabbitty is a children's story that Ron mentions. Hermione and Harry did not hear stories like this when they were little.

relationships.description: Ron looked at Harry in disbelief.
Hermione related Bubbitty Rabbitty to children's stories that she and Harry heard when they were little.
